testimonials.name: Nathalie
testimonials.quotes: Taryn Lee is a gem. She is very knowlegdeable and wise. She is super kind and always willing to help. She is very friendly and makes new friends everywhere. She is a people's person and enjoy being around people. I am  very honored to be in her class and being here peer.

testimonials.name: Jason
testimonials.quotes: Taryn-lee Walbrugh is an outstanding individual I enjoy working with her, she always promotes positivity , great communicative skills and has unmatched enthusiasm and determination. She is the ideal work colleague but mainly a wonderful companion and friend.

testimonials.name: Anathi
testimonials.quotes: Taryn-lee Walbrugh is a highly dedicated and inquisitive individual with unwavering focus on achieving projects goals.She is consistently exhibited a strong commitment to learning and problem-solving

testimonials.name: Seth
testimonials.quotes: Taryn-lee is a wonderful individual. She is a very caring and honest individual.She is also a very well organized  and knows what she wants. She gets the things she needs to do done. Quickly and efficiently. She is also very effective at management.  She will be a great asset to any organization.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quotes: Taryn-lee is a creative, goal-getter, and well-behaved individual who always prioritizes her work. She excels in collaborating with others and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap. Including Git and GitHub.

testimonials.name: Veronique
testimonials.quotes: I've had the privilege of getting to know Taryn-lee very well over the past few months. She has repeatedly shown she has a very high work ethic and takes pride in her work. She has displayed numerous characteristics such as determination and effective team work which I know will serve her well into her future. She is incredibly smart and I believe that as she gains more confidence in her programming knowledge, she will be invaluable to any team and company she is a part of.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This is my calculator app, and I built it using HTML 5, CSS 3, Javascript, and Bootstrap's icon. In order to validate my input element, I make use of regular expressions.

projects.name: Message believers Circle
projects.description: MBC is an application I built for my client for selling products online. I make use of Vue3 JS, MySQL, APIs, and JSON Web Tokens.
